creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
description: Virgin's garments red and blue gold-flecked. Angel's garments green and brown, gold-flecked. Wings, green, red, turquoise, gold; curtains, gold-flecked peacock blue. Blue sky with gold radiations. Blue sky with gold radiations. Blue and gold tiled floor and prie-dieu. Plaque, enamel on copper, French, XVIc cat. card dims 9-1/2 x 7-3/8"
title: The Annunciation
